Reviews.Title: “HARD TO BEAT !!!”
Reviews.Author: accord24
Reviews.Content: pleasure staying august 4 nights staff friendly helpfull comfortable quiet clean locality tops wonderful visit walking distance resturants abound metro hill lots busses door look forward return visit

Reviews.Title: “Incredible location and staff”
Reviews.Author: pilotguy13
Reviews.Content: experience paris cant beat location price combination latin quarter free wifi hot showers water pressure clean front desk staff super nice 3 person available help beds bit firm typical pillows 5 minute walk notre dame food eat convenient trains happy quiet 4th floor floor creaked bad hopefully didnt disturb below thats concern

Reviews.Title: “Nice rooms in a perfect location”
Reviews.Author: Imissucico
Reviews.Content: hotel suez offers perfect combination comfort convenience located directly hearth latin quartier walking distance notre dame ile de france louvre attractions arent including shower course bit expensive cant expect pay parisian downtown hotel staff friendly helpful breakfast included 5 euro tiny hall extracharge

Reviews.Title: “Nice room but noisy”
Reviews.Author: Tallguy_11
Reviews.Content: happily surprised triple size bathroom parisian cute stayed fairly warm aircon windows barcafe below noise late night youre happy accept paris love hotel staff helpful hotel awesome location value money paris barcafe

Reviews.Title: “don't stay here”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 2 friends aug 2011 plus location pretty close bus stop metro station regret didnt choose hotel ugly bathroom okay separate toilet bedcover clean itchy night night left found hotels cluny surrounded cool restaurants bars

Reviews.Title: “Never stay in non-multinational chain hotel”
Reviews.Author: hegzo
Reviews.Content: location extremely tight escalator max 2 persons bags staff reception impolite unfriendly leave hotel 2nd night babycot nor space

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel in excellent location”

Reviews.Content: stayed boyfriend 3 nights recently impressed location hotel excellent seeing paris near metro rer stops near lot walkable distance notre dame cathedral louvre dont public transport staff friendly helpful 24 hrs reception useful esp worry taking key plenty storage space lacking hotel bathroom bright thanks sky light shelves whcih nice didnt damp floor previous review mention wiht housekeeping didnt issue ensuite clean day towels replaced etc breakfasts pleasant filling excellent hot chocolate served free feature little balcony overlooking roofs street below meant fresh air table seats nice criticism id bit picky signs saying drinks available reception none supermarket door snacks drinks alcoholic nonalcoholic dont forget bottle opener aside id definitely recommend getting batobus notre dame wonderful getting seine especially cruise night 930pm lit looks beautiful goes eiffel tower ticket lasts day hop onoff tour overall id hotel base stay paris definitely stay

Reviews.Content: strongly recommend hotel run family past 28 especially travellers staying near latin quarter heart paris able walk hotel late night valued experience stayed outside metro ring catch bus taxi home metro closes midnight paris dining liked enormous range choice menu price latin quarter offered 5 minutes walking distance hotel shopping st michel boulevarde hotel located met staff hotel multilingual helpful friendly spotlessly clean comfortable negative pay internet pity whos complaining else

Reviews.Content: chose hotel location didnt disappoint near metro stations market door cafes restaurants attractions short walk arrived paris train gare montparnasse twenty minutes hotel floor window facing interior hotel street noise minimal interior noise adequate didnt air conditioning fan clean definitely update cramped european hotel free wifi staff nice assistance leave bags hours checked impression perfect hotel people spend vacation seeing city hotel sleep

Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights teenage sons stayed hotel staff wonderful cot son fan heatwave visited helped advice restaurants transportation accomodations roomy beds ok special price worth hotel location middle sites shopping hotel central noisy night hot visited windows night noisey earplugs probably solved didnt afterwards breakfasts simple croissant mini bagette cafe au lait oj water delicious deal looking value central location option

Reviews.Title: “Just the right combination”
Reviews.Author: Bluemoon52
Reviews.Content: stayed paris hotels latin germain rarely found hotel combination price location facilities service 2 star hotel attitude 3 star welcome authentically friendly paris standards bathroom price location perfect minutes luxembourg gardens pantheon river notre dame bars restaurants st germain throughout stay reception staff helpful polite welcoming clean wellrun downside little noisy night hotel boulevard st michel price personally dont issue

Reviews.Title: “simple but nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: brazilian_tourist
Reviews.Content: third time stayed hotel de suez it´s location simply perfect walking distance notre dame louvre jardin de luxembourg museum hotel simple price pay reasonable paris standards renovation front desk staff nice helpful recommend breakfast hotel price charge 7 euros believe options nearby try pauls 14 boulevard st michel 2 subway stations close hotel don´t taxi airport rer trains charles de gaulle stop stations

Reviews.Title: “A decent place to stay in a great location”
Reviews.Author: theslant
Reviews.Content: chose hotel staying budget read nice reviews online prior booking comfortable clean nice sized decent private bath shower elevator bit creaky sufficient bringing luggage fairly priced pot coffee morning stayed brought front desk helpful booked bus tour city front desk priced options planned elsewhere booked sooner recommend taking bus tour trip paris night tour allowed beautifully lit eiffel tower hotel walked train station street hotel st michel believe able easily walk station hotel door door little hard spot river seine block overall satisfied stay return travelling paris budget cheapest decent hotel center paris didnt disappoint
